SELECT COALESCE ( t1.`name`, #{query.agencyName} ,"无" ) AS agencyName, COALESCE ( t1.duration, 0 ) AS duration, COALESCE ( t1.visitorCount, 0 ) AS visitorCount FROM ( SELECT SUM( vp.play_duration ) duration, SUM( vp.visitor_count ) visitorCount, org.name FROM video_play vp LEFT JOIN org_agency org ON vp.agency_id = org.id WHERE org.is_delete = 0
AND org.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{query.agencyName},'%')
AND vp.work_cycle =#{query.workCycle}
GROUP BY vp.agency_id ) t1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT 0 ) t2 ON 1 = 1
